description: Variation of condition 1 (Plans) pursuant to planning permission 16/8089/S73 dated 01/03/2017 for 'Variation of condition 8 (Landscaping) pursuant to planning permission 16/5801/S73        dated 09/12/2016 for 'Variation of condition 2 (plan Numbers) of planning permission 15/06228/FUL dated 16/11/2015 for 'Demolition of existing dwelling and construction of new 2 storey dwelling with basement and rooms in roof space, including replacement boundary wall.'  Amendments to include increase to basement gym area, additional single storey rear projection, alteration to ground floor rear elevation with replacement of french doors with two new windows and relocation of rear dormer'. Variations include remove trees of poor-moderate form and introduce a more diverse age structure to the `wooded' area'. Variation include amendments permitted pool plant room with separate access for maintenance
